mapper.select: SELECT house.id as id, house.position as position, type.content as type, house.area as area, house.`status` as status, house.update_date as updateDate FROM house,type where house.status='空楼' and house.type_id=type.id

select house.id as id, house.position as position, user.`name` as name, type.content as type, house.area as area, house.`status` as status, house.update_date as updateDate FROM user,house,type where (user.id=house.user_id AND house.type_id=type.id)

select house.id as id, house.position as position, user.`name` as name, type.content as type, house.area as area, house.`status` as status, house.update_date as updateDate FROM user,house,type where (user.id=house.user_id AND house.type_id=type.id) and (type.content LIKE concat('%',#{selectStr},'%') or user.name like concat('%',#{selectStr},'%') or house.position like concat('%',#{selectStr},'%'))

select house.id as id, house.position as position, type.content as type, house.area as area, house.`status` as status, house.update_date as updateDate FROM house,type where ( house.type_id=type.id) and house.status='空楼' and (type.content LIKE concat('%',#{selectStr},'%') or house.position like concat('%',#{selectStr},'%'))
mapper.update: update house SET status=#{status} where user_id=#{userId}
